code_repository_index.description: Required. Id of the Code Repository Index.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

labels.description: Optional. Labels as key value pairs. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

location.description: The location of the Code Repository Index, for example 'us-central1'.

name.description: Immutable. Identifier. Name of Repository Group.

repository_group_id.description: Required. Id of the Repository Group.

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

branch_pattern.description: Required. The Git branch pattern used for indexing in RE2 syntax. See https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/syntax for syntax.

resource.description: Required. The DeveloperConnect repository full resource name, relative resource name or resource URL to be indexed.

block.description: Required. List of repositories to group.
